content.description: Whether you're just getting started in the park, or just getting started on the mountain, the Armada ARV 84 Skis are a perfect first step. They're made with a lightweight, highly durable composite core, plus semi-cap sidewalls and oversized edges for maximum durability. They're soft and easy to press into a variety of turn shapes, which makes them perfect for mastering the art of the turn, or bashing against rails on your way to your first stomp.
content.name: Armada ARV 100 Skis 7000
content.richTextDescription: # Whether you're just getting started in the **park,** or just getting started on the mountain, the Armada ARV 84 Skis are a perfect first step. They're made with a lightweight, highly durable composite core, plus semi\-cap sidewalls and oversized edges for maximum durability. They're soft and easy to press into a variety of turn shapes, which makes them perfect for mastering the art of the turn, or bashing against rails on your way to your first stomp.
